name: SKYVINE
description:
An adventurer named Dude discovers a really rare sprout with an impressive growing power. Without even thinking about it, Dude grabs its top leaves and reaches for the sky!

Hitting passing obstacles will actually make your trip faster and more hazardous. But sometimes, speed is the best way to reach high levels.

This game jam was made for DTGMA-VI.


Keyboard Controls
[Up, Down, Left, Right] Move Character
[Space] Drop Item
[Enter] Pause Game

Credits (2013)
Cab - Art
technobeanie - Game Design, Programming, Audio.
